locations.title: GAP
locations.description: The Gap, Inc., commonly known as Gap Inc. or Gap, is an American worldwide clothing and accessories retailer.

locations.title: babyGAP
locations.description: Discover a selection of baby clothes at Gap for cute outfits made with quality and style. Shop a variety of baby clothing for your little bundle of joy.

locations.title: Forever 21
locations.description: Forever 21 is the authority on fashion & the go-to retailer for the latest trends, styles & the hottest deals. Shop dresses, tops, tees, leggings & more!

locations.title: Banana Republic
locations.description: Shop Banana Republic for versatile, contemporary classics, designed for today with style that endures.

locations.title: Cotton On
locations.description: Cotton On Group is Australia's largest global retailer, known for its fashion clothing and stationery brands.

locations.title: Champs Sports
locations.description: Champs Sports is an American sports retail store, it operates as a subsidiary of Foot Locker. Products sold at Champs Sports include apparel, equipment, footwear, and accessories.

locations.title: Tilly's
locations.description: Tillys is an American retail clothing company that sells an assortment of branded apparel, accessories, shoes, and more.

locations.title: The Shades Store
locations.description: The Shades Store has a huge selection of blinds, shades, and drapes made from the finest materials and designer fabrics.

locations.title: GNC
locations.description: GNC Holdings Inc. is a Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania-based American company selling health and nutrition related products, including vitamins, supplements, minerals, herbs, sports nutrition, diet, and energy products.

locations.title: Petco
locations.description: Petco Animal Supplies, Inc., or simply Petco, is an American pet retailer in the United States, with corporate offices in San Diego and San Antonio. Petco sells pet products and services, as well as certain types of live animals.

locations.title: Nordstrom
locations.description: Nordstrom Inc. is an American chain of luxury department stores, also operating in Canada and headquartered in Seattle, Washington.

locations.title: Healthy Spot
locations.description: Healthy Spot is a pet store offering dog grooming, dog daycare, and community experiences. We sell the best dog food available with offerings for cats as well!

locations.title: Auntie Anne's Pretzels
locations.description: Auntie Anne's is known for hand-baked pretzels to be enjoyed with a refreshing lemonade. Visit our website to stay up-to-date on current news & events!

locations.title: Fashion Nova Men
locations.description: Fashionova Men is top affordable men's fashion. Find the hottest trends and styles: jeans, jackets, joggers, track pants, hoodies, matching sets, tops, bottoms, shorts, gym, etc.

locations.title: Fashion Nova
locations.description: Fashion Nova is the top online fashion store for women. Shop sexy club dresses, jeans, shoes, bodysuits, skirts and more.

locations.title: Cologne Kiosk
locations.description: An example of a cologne kiosk in the mall.

locations.title: Perfume Kiosk
locations.description: An example of a perfume kiosk in the mall.

locations.title: Restroom A
locations.description: Restrooms for the underground level.

locations.title: Parking B
locations.description: Parking Lot B

locations.title: Parking C
locations.description: Parking Lot C

locations.title: Parking D
locations.description: Parking Lot D

locations.title: Urban Outfitters
locations.description: Urban Outfitters is a lifestyle retailer dedicated to inspiring customers through a unique combination of product, creativity and cultural understanding. Urban Outfitters now operates over 200 stores in the United States.

locations.title: Victoria Secret
locations.description: Victoria's Secret is an American designer, manufacturer, and marketer of women's lingerie, womenswear, and beauty products.

locations.title: Bath & Body Works
locations.description: Shop Bath & Body Works for the best home fragrance, gifts, body & bath products! Find discontinued fragrances and browse bath supplies to treat your body.

locations.title: Burberry
locations.description: Burberry Group PLC is a British luxury fashion house headquartered in London, England. Its main fashion house focuses on and distributes trench coats, ready-to-wear outerwear, fashion accessories, fragrances, sunglasses, and cosmetics.

locations.title: Gucci
locations.description: Gucci is an Italian luxury brand of fashion and leather goods. Gucci was founded by Guccio Gucci in Florence, Tuscany, in 1921.

locations.title: Wells Fargo
locations.description: Wells Fargo & Company is an American multinational financial services company headquartered in San Francisco, California, with central offices throughout the United States. It is the world's fourth-largest bank by market capitalization and the fourth largest bank in the US by total assets.

locations.title: Sunglass Hut
locations.description: Sunglass Hut is an international retailer of sunglasses and sunglass accessories founded in Miami, Florida, United States, in 1971. Sunglass Hut is part of the Italian-based Luxottica Group, the world’s largest eyewear company.

locations.title: Zales
locations.description: The Zale Corporation is an American jewelry retailer, incorporated in Delaware in 1993. The principal executive offices are located in Irving, Texas.

locations.title: Tiffany & Co.
locations.description: Tiffany & Co. is an American luxury jewelry and specialty retailer headquartered in New York City. It sells jewelry, sterling silver, china, crystal, stationery, fragrances, water bottles, watches, personal accessories, and leather goods.

locations.title: Steve Madden
locations.description: Steven Madden, Ltd., also known as Steve Madden, is a publicly traded company based in Long Island City, New York. Founded by the eponymous designer and businessman Steve Madden, the company designs and markets shoes and fashion accessories for women, men and children.

locations.title: Pandora
locations.description: Pandora A/S is an international Danish jewellery manufacturer and retailer founded in 1982 by Per Enevoldsen. The company started as a family-run jewellery shop in Copenhagen. Pandora is known for its customizable charm bracelets, designer rings, necklaces and watches.

locations.title: Michael Kors
locations.description: Michael Kors, sells men's and women's and ready-to-wear, accessories, watches, jewelry, footwear, and fragrance.

locations.title: Mac Cosmetics
locations.description: MAC Cosmetics, stylized as M·A·C, is a cosmetics manufacturer founded in Toronto, Canada in 1984 by Frank Toskan and Frank Angelo. The company is headquartered in New York City and became part of the Estée Lauder Companies in 1996. MAC is an acronym for Make-up Art Cosmetics.

locations.title: The Body Shop
locations.description: The Body Shop International Limited, trading as The Body Shop, is a cosmetics, skin care and perfume company which is a subsidiary of Brazilian company Natura & Co. Founded in 1976 in Brighton, UK by Dame Anita Roddick.

locations.title: Express
locations.description: Express, Inc. is an American fashion retailer that caters mainly to young men and women. The company is headquartered in Columbus, Ohio. Express operates 631 stores in the United States, and Puerto Rico, and formerly in Canada.

locations.title: The Children's Place
locations.description: Children's Place Inc. is an American specialty retailer of children’s apparel and accessories. The company also markets apparel under the Children's Place, Place, and Baby Place brand names.

locations.title: Elevator Ground
locations.description: Ground floor elevator

locations.title: Louis Vuitton
locations.description: Louis Vuitton Malletier, commonly referred to as Louis Vuitton or shortened to LV, is a French fashion house and luxury retail company founded in 1854 by Louis Vuitton.

locations.title: Nordstrom
locations.description: Nordstrom Inc. is an American chain of luxury department stores, also operating in Canada and headquartered in Seattle, Washington.

locations.title: Macy's
locations.description: Macy's is an upscale American department store chain founded in 1858 by Rowland Hussey Macy. As of 2015, Macy's was the largest U.S. department store company by retail sales.

locations.title: JCPenney
locations.description: JCPenney Company, Inc is an American department store chain with 865 locations in 49 U.S. states and Puerto Rico.

locations.title: Walgreens
locations.description: Walgreen Company or simply Walgreens is an American company that operates as the second-largest pharmacy store chain in the United States behind CVS Health. It specializes in filling prescriptions, health and wellness products, health information, and photo services.

locations.title: Sephora
locations.description: Sephora is a French multinational chain of personal care and beauty stores. Featuring nearly 300 brands, along with its own private label, Sephora offers beauty products including cosmetics, skincare, body, fragrance, nail color, beauty tools, and haircare.

locations.title: Geox
locations.description: Geox is an Italian brand of shoe and clothing manufactured with waterproof/breathable fabrics.

locations.title: H&M
locations.description: Hennes & Mauritz AB is a Swedish multinational clothing-retail company known for its fast-fashion clothing for men, women, teenagers and children. H&M and its associated companies operate in 62 countries with over 4,500 stores.

locations.title: Adidas
locations.description: Adidas AG is a multinational corporation, founded and headquartered in Herzogenaurach, Germany, that designs and manufactures shoes, clothing and accessories. It is the largest sportswear manufacturer in Europe, and the second largest in the world, after Nike.

locations.title: Massimo Dutti
locations.description: Massimo Dutti is a Spanish clothes manufacturing company that is part of the Inditex group. When founded in 1985, its product range was limited to men's clothing, with a women's range added in 1995.

locations.title: Starbucks
locations.description: Starbucks Corporation is an American coffee company and coffeehouse chain. Starbucks was founded in Seattle, Washington, in 1971. As of early 2019, the company operates over 30,000 locations worldwide.

locations.title: Zara
locations.description: Zara is a Spanish apparel retailer based in Arteixo in Galicia. The company specializes in fast fashion, and products include clothing, accessories, shoes, swimwear, beauty, and perfumes.

locations.title: Foot Locker
locations.description: Foot Locker Retail, Inc. is an American sportswear and footwear retailer, with its headquarters in Midtown Manhattan, New York City, and operating in 28 countries.

locations.title: Journeys
locations.description: Journeys Has the Latest Styles of Skate Shoes, Athletic Sneakers, Boots, Sandals, and more or Men, Women, and Kids.

locations.title: Lacoste
locations.description: Lacoste is a French company, founded in 1933 by tennis player René Lacoste and André Gillier. It sells clothing, footwear, sportswear, eyewear, leather goods, perfume, towels and watches. The company can be recognised by its green crocodile logo.

locations.title: Kids Foot Locker
locations.description: At Kids Foot Locker shop kids shoes and clothing from big brands like Nike, Jordan, adidas, Reebok and a bunch more.

locations.title: Lids
locations.description: Lids Inc. is an American retailer specializing in athletic headwear. It primarily operates under the LIDS brand with stores in the U.S., Puerto Rico and Canada. The majority of the stores operate in shopping malls and factory outlet centers.

locations.title: Restroom Ground
locations.description: Ground level restroom

locations.title: Mrs. Fields
locations.description: Healthy Spot is a pet store offering dog grooming, dog daycare, and community experiences. We sell the best dog food available with offerings for cats as well!

locations.title: Jamba Juice
locations.description: Jamba, formerly known as Jamba Juice, is a company that produces blended fruit and vegetable juices, smoothies and similar products.

locations.title: Lens Crafters
locations.description: LensCrafters is an international retailer of prescription eyewear and prescription sunglasses. Its stores usually host independent optometrists on-site or in an adjacent store.

locations.title: Go Greek Yogurt
locations.description: Authentic Greek Yogurt cafe serving Classic Handcrafted Greek Yogurt and Frozen Greek Yogurt in Beverly Hills, Santa Monica and Woodland Hills.

locations.title: Photo Booth
locations.description: Photo booth at the mall

locations.title: Parking A
locations.description: Parking lot A

locations.title: Applebee's
locations.description: Full-service chain bar & grill providing hearty American eats in an informal setting.

locations.title: KFC
locations.description: KFC, also known as Kentucky Fried Chicken, is an American fast food restaurant chain headquartered in Louisville, Kentucky, that specializes in fried chicken. It is the world's second-largest restaurant chain after McDonald's.

locations.title: McDonald's
locations.description: McDonald's Corporation is an American fast food company, founded in 1940 as a restaurant operated by Richard and Maurice McDonald, in San Bernardino, California, United States. It's the largest restaurant chain in the world.

locations.title: Pizza Hut
locations.description: Pizza Hut is an American restaurant chain and international franchise which was founded in 1958 in Wichita, Kansas by Dan and Frank Carney. The company is known for its Italian American cuisine menu, including pizza and pasta, as well as side dishes and desserts.

locations.title: Subway
locations.description: Subway is an American privately held restaurant franchise that primarily sells submarine sandwiches and salads. It is one of the fastest-growing franchises in the world and, as of October 2019, had 41,512 locations in more than 100 countries.

locations.title: CVS Pharmacy
locations.description: CVS Pharmacy is a subsidiary of the American retail and health care company CVS Health, headquartered in Woonsocket, Rhode Island. It was also known as, and originally named, the Consumer Value Store and was founded in Lowell, Massachusetts, in 1963.

locations.title: Pull & Bear
locations.description: Pull&Bear is a Spanish clothing and accessories retailer based in Narón (A Coruña), Galicia. It was founded in 1986 as New Wear, S.A. and it was officially launched as Pull & Bear in 1991.

locations.title: AMC Theatres
locations.description: AMC Theatres is a U.S.-based movie theater chain headquartered in Leawood, Kansas, and is the largest movie theater chain in the world. Founded in 1920, AMC has the largest share of the American theater market ahead of Cineworld and Cinemark Theatres.

locations.title: AT&T
locations.description: AT&T Inc. is an American multinational conglomerate holding company headquartered at Whitacre Tower in Downtown Dallas, Texas.It is the world's largest telecommunications company.s.

locations.title: Blaze Pizza
locations.description: Blaze Pizza LLC is a Pasadena, California-based chain within the fast-casual dining restaurants category. Founded in 2011 by Elise and Rick Wetzel of Wetzel's Pretzels, Blaze Pizza was modeled after the Chipotle concept as a made-to-order approach to serving customers.

locations.title: Cinnabon
locations.description: Cinnabon is an American chain of baked goods stores and kiosks, normally found in areas with high pedestrian traffic such as malls, airports and rest stops.

locations.title: Panda Express
locations.description: Panda Express is a fast food restaurant chain which serves American Chinese cuisine. With over 2,200 locations, it is the largest Asian segment restaurant chain in the United States, where it was founded and is mainly located.

locations.title: Dairy Queen
locations.description: Dairy Queen is an American chain of soft serve ice cream and fast-food restaurants owned by International Dairy Queen, Inc., a subsidiary of Berkshire Hathaway.

locations.title: Coffee Bean
locations.description: The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf is an American coffee chain founded in 1963. It is owned and operated by International Coffee & Tea, LLC, which has its corporate headquarters in Los Angeles, California.

locations.title: Panera Bread
locations.description: Panera Bread Company is an American chain store of bakery-café fast casual restaurants with over 2,000 locations, all of which are in the United States and Canada. Its headquarters are in Sunset Hills, Missouri, a suburb of St. Louis.

locations.title: Baskin Robbins
locations.description: Baskin-Robbins is an American chain of ice cream and cake specialty shop restaurants. Its parent company is Dunkin' Brands.

locations.title: Cava
locations.description: CAVA is a growing Mediterranean culinary brand with a flavorful and healthy fast-casual restaurant experience featuring customizable & craveable salads.

locations.title: Chick-fil-A
locations.description: Chick-fil-A is one of the largest American fast food restaurant chains and the largest whose specialty is chicken sandwiches.

locations.title: Lego
locations.description: LEGO A/S, doing business as The LEGO Group, is a Danish toy production company based in Billund. It is best known for the manufacture of LEGO-brand toys, consisting mostly of interlocking plastic bricks.

locations.title: Metro PCS
locations.description: Metro by T-Mobile is a prepaid brand owned by T-Mobile US. It previously operated the fifth largest mobile telecommunications network in the United States using code-division multiple access.

locations.title: T-Mobile
locations.description: T-Mobile US, Inc., commonly shortened to T-Mobile, is a United States–based wireless network operator; its majority shareholder is the German telecommunications company Deutsche Telekom.

locations.title: Finish Line
locations.description: Finish Line, Inc. is an American retail chain that sells athletic shoes and related apparel and accessories. The company operates 660 stores in 47 states and Puerto Rico, mostly in enclosed shopping malls, as well as Finish Line-branded athletic shoe departments in more than 450 Macy's stores.

locations.title: Yoga Works
locations.description: YogaWorks is one of the largest and fastest growing providers of yoga instruction in the U.S., with almost 3 million student visits in 2016. The company operates 66 company-owned studios as well as their Internet-based digital media service.

locations.title: Elevator 2
locations.description: Elevator located in the mall

locations.title: Chase ATM
locations.description: JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A., doing business as Chase Bank, is a national bank headquartered in Manhattan, New York City, that constitutes the consumer and commercial banking subsidiary of the U.S. multinational banking and financial services holding company, JPMorgan Chase.

locations.title: Ambercrombie and Fitch
locations.description: Abercrombie & Fitch is an American lifestyle retailer that focuses on casual wear. Its headquarters are in New Albany, Ohio. The company operates two other offshoot brands: Abercrombie Kids and Hollister Co.

locations.title: Nike
locations.description: Nike, Inc. is an American multinational corporation that is engaged in the design, development, manufacturing, and worldwide marketing and sales of footwear, apparel, equipment, accessories, and services.

locations.title: Spencer's
locations.description: Spencer Gifts LLC, doing business as Spencer's, is a North American mall retailer with over 600 stores in the United States, Canada and Puerto Rico.

locations.title: Apple
locations.description: Apple Inc. is an American multinational technology company headquartered in Cupertino, California, that designs, develops, and sells consumer electronics, computer software, and online services.

locations.title: Parking E
locations.description: Parking lot E!
